name: Refuse To Die
description:
Entry into the ICT Game Jam Summer 2021, 7/30- 8/1

Made by Sushil Sundaram, Ty Foster and Daniel Brazell

Controls -

[WASD] to move.

[SPACE] to jump and clamber.

[W] to climb up when clambering.

[E] to enter lockers to hide from the enemies.

The player automatically pushes boxes with yellow caution stripes.
